title: Rapper Drake Played Fortnite over PUBG
body:
https://www.theverge.com/2018/3/15/17123424/ninja-drake-fortnite-twitch-stream-record-travis-scott-juju

Fortnite is now officially the better game. (I mean, it was always the better game, but PUBG players refused to believe it.)

No other proof is necessary.
